file_content.text: The Death Mark has been destroyed. Your people are safe.
I will inform Organa Palace immediately. We are forever in your debt.
Duke Thul reports you executed the spy Aleyna. I wish she could have stood trial for her crimes.
Her testimony might have turned the other houses firmly against the Empire.
You'd never get a confession out of Aleyna.
That's unlikely.
Still, a trial would've been just. Battlefield executions are... unseemly.
I put justice before politics. So should you.
She deserved execution.
I see your point.
Duke Thul sent us the spy Aleyna as a show of good faith. She's to stand trial for her crimes.
Her testimony will expose the Empire for what it is. No house will ally with them after this.
The sooner the Empire leaves Alderaan, the better.
I hope that's true.
Darth Angral captured and murdered my Jedi Master.
Master Orgus is dead.
My sympathies. Master Orgus seemed like a great man.
Rest assured, I won't let your Master's sacrifice be in vain. Be well, Jedi.
The Empire gets what it wants, one way or another. Your show trial won't change that.
Don't count on it.
I have to believe otherwise.
Please forgive my abruptness, but I am needed elsewhere. This threat is ended, but the war goes on.
I hope someday Alderaan knows lasting peace. Farewell, Master Jedi.
We should head back to the ship. Tell General Var Suthra about Master Orgus.
Jedi + T7 = return to ship? // General Var Suthra = needs to know about Master Orgus
House Thul is well-guarded. Be careful.
Master Orgus is eager to speak with you.
You're with the young Jedi? Welcome.
